kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:8000/ path_url=/ headers={'Content-Length': '20', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'traceparent': u'traceparentA', 'content-type': u'application/hive-essence'} body=mockedinvalidessence

POST Response : url=http://localhost:8000/ status=400, reason=Bad Request headers={'Traceparent': 'traceparentA', 'Date': 'Tue, 10 Jan 2023 15:16:04 GMT', 'Content-length': '113'} body=The received hive essence is not valid. Expected is a list of bytes containing: {id},{version};{id},{version}....
HTTPError: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: http://localhost:8000/
${resp} = ('FAIL', u'HTTPError: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: http://localhost:8000/')
